org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators.Histogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Accumulator<Integer,Map<Integer,Integer>>, IOReadableWritable

    public class Histogram
extends Object
implements Accumulator<Integer,Map<Integer,Integer>>
    Histogram for discrete-data. Let's you populate a histogram distributedly. Implemented as a Integer->Integer TreeMap, so that the entries are sorted according to the values. Could be extended to continuous values later, but then we need to dynamically decide about the bin size in an online algorithm (or ask the user)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
